visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts bar chart with horizontal columns. The chart should display the historic world population by region for the years 1990, 2000, and 2021. The chart should have a title 'Historic World Population by Region' and a subtitle with a source link to Wikipedia. The x-axis should list the regions 'Africa', 'America', 'Asia', and 'Europe'. The y-axis should display the population in millions. The bars should have rounded corners and data labels enabled. The legend should be positioned vertically at the top-right corner of the chart. The chart should have a white background with a shadow effect on the legend. The chart should be styled with specific colors for the axes and labels, and the series data should be provided with appropriate names and values.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration object is designed to render a bar chart with horizontal columns, displaying the historic world population by region for the years 1990, 2000, and 2021. The chart features a title and subtitle, with the subtitle containing a link to the source data on Wikipedia. The x-axis lists the regions 'Africa', 'America', 'Asia', and 'Europe', while the y-axis represents the population in millions. The bars are styled with rounded corners and data labels enabled for clarity. The legend is positioned vertically at the top-right corner of the chart, with a white background and a shadow effect for better visibility. The chart also includes specific colors for the axes and labels, enhancing readability. The series data is provided with appropriate names and values, ensuring the chart accurately represents the population data for each year.
